mapper.sql: id, description, name, type, pid, code, en_visible
mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM pe_user AS u LEFT JOIN pe_user_role AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN pe_role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN pe_role_permission AS rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN pe_permission AS p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
SELECT pe.* FROM pe_permission pe LEFT JOIN pe_permission_point pp ON pp.point_class = pe.code LEFT JOIN pe_permission_api pa ON pa.id = pp.api_id WHERE pe.type='2' and pa.api_url = #{path}
